ContentFolderLink.name: ContentFolderLink
ContentFolderLink.description: Defines the association between a library and its root folder.

EnableFolderStatus.description: Indicates the status of enabling folders for the library. Valid values are: C — Completed folder enablement S — Started folder enablement F — Failed folder enablement This field is available in API version 39.0 and later.

ParentEntityId.description: Name of the entity the folder hierarchy is linked to.
